channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Reflections with fr. leo clifford
channel.desc: Fr Leo discusses the Parable of the Good Samaritan as a motivational tool.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary, praying on the suffering of Jesus Christ.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Daily mass
channel.desc: The Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with the friars each day from the EWTN Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. LIVE Monday through Saturday at 8 am Eastern.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Walsingham stories
channel.desc: Fr. Peter Walters talks about how he went on vacation and came back with a vocation, dedicating his life to an outreach that helps care for street children in Medell?n, Colombia.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Presenting the latest news from the Vatican with excerpts and analysis of the Holy Father's recent audiences and writings, newsmaker interviews, and highlights.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Live from the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Live Adoration From EWTN Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Michael The Visitor
channel.desc: Narrated by Stockard Channing, this charming fable is an adaptation of Tolstoys classic tale about a lost young man with an amazing secret.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Worldwide Children's Holy Hour
channel.desc: A Eucharistic and Marian Holy Hour in which children will be united throughout the world praying for families and for peace.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: At home with jim and joy
channel.desc: Dynamic husband and wife radio team Jim and Joy Pinto bring their powerful witness to daytime TV with special guests and topics focusing on marriage, family, and pro-life issues.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Syria, ItS Not The End
channel.desc: Fr. Hugo and his team developed a network to bring basic needs to the most vulnerable in war torn Syria. See the faith and courage in these Christian men and wo.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Daily mass
channel.desc: The Holy Sacrifice of the Mass with the friars each day from the EWTN Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. LIVE Monday through Saturday at 8 am Eastern.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes Grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Women of grace
channel.desc: Explore the gift of healing with Sr Briege McKenna, well-known for her international ministry.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Heidi explains how an announcement from her Baptist pastor steered her into an extended period of prayer and her discernment that led to Jesus calling her home to the Eucharist.

channel.name: EWTN UK
channel.title: Holy Mass & Eucharistic...
channel.desc: Procession from St Patrick's Cathedral. Follow the 2024 Eucharistic Procession in New York City, beginning at Saint Patrick's Cathedral.
